
                            
                            <p>之前储蓄卡限额了，打客服电话让我在app申请，然后就忘了这件事了，今天突然收到短信。。。无语了 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/111543ivokv5zwk8pt5k8t.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/111543ivokv5zwk8pt5k8t.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/111543odlfzeprvmez3krs.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/111543odlfzeprvmez3krs.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/111544yhz3zs5r6u4bh7u4.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/111544yhz3zs5r6u4bh7u4.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">这个要连坐的。boc的更严。你不催的话。怎么会主动给你弄</p><p class="pl">建行效率最高<br>三个工作日就提成功了</p><p class="pl">跟你联系的客服放产假了，所以还没够5个工作日</p><p></p>
